rules.name: Submit_GSR_Assessment_Decision
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND (2 OR 3) AND (4 OR 5) AND (6 OR 7)
rules.label: Submit GSR Assessment

fields.name: Display_Appliance_Details_Screen
fields.fieldText:
APPLIANCE RESULTS DETAILS:


Type: {!GSR_Appliances_Added.Appliance_Type__c}

Location: {!GSR_Appliances_Added.Appliance_Location__c}

Manufacturer: {!GSR_Appliances_Added.Appliance_Manufacturer__c}

Model: {!GSR_Appliances_Added.Appliance_model__c}

Gas Council Number: {!GSR_Appliances_Added.Gas_Council_Number__c}

Landlord's device: {!GSR_Appliances_Added.Landlords_Device__c}

Measurement: {!GSR_Appliances_Added.Appliance_Measurement__c} {!GSR_Appliances_Added.Appliance_measurement_type__c}


FLUE DETAILS:


Flue Type: {!GSR_Appliances_Added.Flue_Type__c}

Safety device(s) correct operation: {!GSR_Appliances_Added.Safety_devices_correct_operation__c}

Spillage test: {!GSR_Appliances_Added.Spillage_test__c}

Smoke pellet flue flow test: {!GSR_Appliances_Added.Smoke_pellet_flue_flow_test__c}


COMBUSTION READINGS:


Initial ratio reading: {!GSR_Appliances_Added.Combustion_Initial_ratio_reading__c}

CO reading: {!GSR_Appliances_Added.Combustion_CO_reading__c}

CO2 reading: {!GSR_Appliances_Added.Combustion_CO2_reading__c}

Final Reading: {!GSR_Appliances_Added.Combustion_Final_Reading__c}


INSPECTION DETAILS:


Satisfactory termination: {!GSR_Appliances_Added.Satisfactory_termination__c}

Satisfactory Flue visual condition: {!GSR_Appliances_Added.Satisfactory_Flue_visual_condition__c}

Adequate ventilation: {!GSR_Appliances_Added.Adequate_ventilation__c}

Inspected: {!GSR_Appliances_Added.Inspected__c}

Appliance serviced: {!GSR_Appliances_Added.Appliance_serviced__c}

Appliance safe to use: {!GSR_Appliances_Added.Appliance_safe_to_use__c}

fields.name: User_Requirements_Disclaimer
fields.fieldText:
In order to submit this GSR, you need to complete the following:

  • Add Gas Install Pipework Assessment
  • Add Audible CO Alarms Assessment
  • Add Appliance Results - A minimal of 1x


If you try to Submit GSR Assessment before completing the above, you will return to this screen.
